children.name: Multi-select placehldr w/ default value containing special chars
children.content:

children.name: Normal placeholder w/ default value containing special chars
children.content:
$[NAME]
Hello, cruel world!

$[PlaceholderWithSpecialChars{Whoa! This is OK? Foo/bar _baz_ La-a is an actual name! Censored profanity: @#%&! The "Best" thing 'ever'. Lotsa Ca$h: Â£22.00 ea. in GBP, Â¥99 Japanese Yen... sÃ¼ÃŸ (German for Â«sweetÂ» as in taste) ... EUR â‚¬99.88 -- *Hello, world!?*  Â¡Hola! 89Â¢ per item}]

Goodbye, cruel world!

children.name: Moment.js test
children.content:
Today's date and time, expressed in various formats:

Default date: $[DATE]
Long format: $[DATE(MMMM D, YYYY)]
Long format with abbreviated month: $[DATE(MMM. DD, YYYY)]
Full format with day of week: $[DATE(dddd, MMMM Do, YYYY)]
Short American format: $[DATE(MM/DD/YYYY)]

Default time: $[TIME]
North American time: $[TIME(h:mm A)]

ISO date: $[DATE(YYYY-MM-DD)]
British date: $[DATE(D MMMM YYYY)]

Military time with seconds: $[DATE(HH:mm:ss)]

Date and time: $[DATE(ddd, MMM DD, YYYY hh:mm a)]
Date and time as two separate placeholders: $[DATE(dddd, MMMM Do, YYYY)] @ $[TIME(h:mm A)]

children.name: Multi-select placehldr w/ default value containing special chars #2
children.content:
$[NAME]

$[PlaceholderWithSpecialChars{Whoa!|This is OK?|Foo/bar _baz_|La-a|Censored profanity: @#%&!|The "Best" thing 'ever'|Lotsa Ca$h|Â£22.00 ea., in GBP|Â¥99 Japanese Yen|sÃ¼ÃŸ (German for Â«sweetÂ» as in taste)|EUR â‚¬99.88|*Hello, world!?*|Â¡Hola! 89Â¢ per item}]

Tested on $[HOSTAPP] $[beta{beta|}]
$[UA]

children.name: Placeholders used multiple times
children.content:
$[salutation] $[name],

My name is $[senderName{Adrianna|Casi|Holly|Jewelya|Poesia|Riley|Taya|Veronica}].  I think you are awesome!  Keep doing what you're doing, $[name]!

Have a nice day, $[name]! :)

$[closing{Yours truly|Best regards|Love}],

$[senderName]

children.name: Single placeholder used multiple times
children.content: Hello $[name], how are you?  It was really nice meeting you, $[name].  Have a nice day, $[name]!
